titleStmt.title: An account of the state of His Majesties revenue, as it was left by the Earl of Danby at Lady-day, 1679 in a letter to a friend : occasioned by his lordships Answer to An examination of the state of the case of the Earl of Danby / by Sir Robert Howard.
titleStmt.author: Howard, Robert, Sir, 1626-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
